#define ffrac ( number   )     (number-(float)((int)number))

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum BWAxisEnumeration

These can be used for the indexes into vectors etc.

Enumerator:
X_AXIS  Specifies the x-axis.
Y_AXIS  Specifies the y-axis.
Z_AXIS  Specifies the z-axis.
X_COORD  Specifies the x-coordinate.
Y_COORD  Specifies the y-coordinate.
Z_COORD  Specifies the z-coordinate.
